name: Slime Escape (itch) (Alexis)
description:
Slime Escape is about a little purple slime trying to make his way back to his family and friends on the other side of the cave while being chased by an evil demon slime.

however the little purple slime is special and has the ability to slow down time making it easier for him to avoid dangers in the area.

this is an early prototype version so there may be a few bugs as well as HUD changes that need to be made in the future.

Controls-

WASD- Movement

F- Slow Down Time

Space- Jump

Shift- Sprint
